title: Grade in MATH101
content: What is my current grade in Mathematics (MATH101)?

title: Semester Grades
content: Show my grades for assessments in Computer Science this semester.

title: Assessment Impact
content: What was my score on Assessment #12 and how does that affect my average?

title: GPA Calculation
content: What is my GPA and how was it calculated?

title: Missing Scores
content: Which of my assessments are missing scores?

title: Performance Breakdown
content: Give me a breakdown of my performance in [subject name or code] by assessment type (exam, assignment, quiz).

title: Recent Assessments
content: List my most recent 5 graded assessments and their scores.

title: Final Exam Target
content: How many marks do I need on the final exam to reach a 70% course average in MATH101?

title: Score Impact Prediction
content: If I get 85% on Assignment 3, what will my overall grade be in CS101?

title: Physics Study Plan
content: I scored 58% on the physics midterm — suggest a 4-week study plan to raise it to 75%.

title: MATH101 Review
content: Explain the main topics I should review for MATH101 final exam and give practice problem ideas.

title: CS Finals Schedule
content: Create a weekly study schedule (6 weeks) to prepare for Finals in Computer Science.

title: Calculus Resources
content: Recommend resources (videos, books, exercises) for learning calculus integration techniques.

title: Assessment Analytics
content: Show average score and standard deviation for Assessment #7 (Data Structures).

title: At-risk Students
content: Which students are at risk (average < 50%) in CS101? List username and current average.

title: Grade Distribution
content: Give me a class-wide grade distribution (A/B/C/D/F) for last semester’s final exam.

title: Reweighting Schemes
content: Suggest reweighting schemes to improve fairness if many students missed the midterm.

title: Feedback Template
content: Provide a short feedback template I can send to students scoring below 40%.

title: Weighting Split
content: What weightings should I use for assignments/midterm/final to reflect a 40/30/30 split?

title: Grading Rubric
content: Create a rubric for grading lab reports (out of 100) with clear criteria.

title: Sample Exam Questions
content: Generate sample exam questions for [topic], 3 easy, 4 medium, 3 hard.

title: Subject Correction
content: I meant [SUBJECT NAME or CODE].

title: Match Term
content: List subjects that match '[TERM]'

title: Available Subjects
content: Show the available subjects and their codes.
